name: HENPals - To Little Old Man, From Quetzalcoatlia 99 edition
description:
Dear Little Old Man,

The beautiful and unique panels of your comic Cowboy Love Is Pure are the tea-stained jewels of my collection. I won’t rest until I have collected every last one! Thank you for transporting me away to a world of cowboys, centipedes and golden yellow canyons every time you mint. You are a true artist!  

Here is an Aztec take on your comic, featuring a flint-knife centipede with ceremonial headdress. 

In love and friendship,
Quetzalcoatlia

This is the /99 variant version of the 1/1 piece, a gift for everyone to enjoy! Send a #HENPal to your favourite artist and let them know you admire them.
